Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides for the office of temporary and disability assistance to provide rental assistance to individuals with a loss of ability to pay rent as a result of COVID-19
Summary: Provides for the office of temporary and disability assistance to provide rental assistance to individuals with a loss of ability to pay rent as a result of COVID-19 without requiring a certification of risk for eviction from a court to demonstrate such loss.
ActClause: AN ACT providing for the office of temporary and disability assistance to provide rental assistance to individuals with a loss of ability to pay rent as a result of COVID-19; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
